head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KNAPP, VIRGINIA R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KNAPP, VIRGINIA R.

block.p: KNAPP-Virginia R. On September 30, 2000. Beloved mother of Diane Hughes, Carole Eppley, Susan Devlin, Joan Barczak and Virginia Burnside. Loving sister of Peter Thornton. Devoted grandmother of 15 grandchildren. Loving aunt of two nieces and three nephews. Funeral service private. A memorial service will be held in La Crosse, WI, at a later date.
